name: LINCOLN PIPESTONE RURAL WATER SYSTEM
description: LPRW is the largest rural water system in MN. They provide water to about 30k people.
sampleDescriptions: Drinking water infrastructure funding. LPRW is seeking funds to finish the development, construction, and implementation of a new water treatment facility and associated infrastructure.

We are working with Senator Fischbach's office to facilitate a potential community funding appropriation for the construction of a water treatment facility and associated infrastructure in southern Mi
